org.elasticsearch.script

类 FilterScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.script.FilterScript

  • public abstract class FilterScript
extends java.lang.Object
    A script implementation of a query filter. See ScriptQueryBuilder.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  FilterScript.Factory
      A factory to construct stateful FilterScript factories for a specific index.
      static interface  FilterScript.LeafFactory
      A factory to construct FilterScript instances.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The context used to compile FilterScript factories.
      static java.lang.String[] PARAMETERS
